name: Suhaib
desc: I am a software developer from India, delivering innovative, efficient, and high-impact web solutions.
aboutDesc: I am a self-taught software developer with a year of internship experience, currently working as a Junior Software Developer. I focus on creating efficient, scalable, and user-friendly software solutions. With a passion for continuous learning, I am dedicated to staying up-to-date with the latest technologies to deliver high-quality results.

subDesc.heading: Innovating the Future
subDesc.des: Developing powerful and dependable software solutions.

aboutSub.heading: Let's Build Together
aboutSub.des: Crafting seamless solutions with intuitive design and exceptional functionality.

projects.project-desc: Brix POS is a powerful system for restaurant transactions and inventory.
Blue Bird is a dynamic social media app for sharing photos and connecting with friends.
ToDoListify is a task management app for organizing and prioritizing your daily tasks.
Bridgeon Solutions uses this system for efficient staff management and operations.
ProLanceX is a freelancing platform for connecting professionals with clients for various projects.
